resources.string: Hi! Welcome to GuessApp! You will see different words on the screen. Don\'t show it to others. You need to explain that words. If they guess the word - you can press the button \"Got it\" and get your score! You have only 60 sec to do it. Otherwise, you will lose 1 score. Press the button \"Start\" to start!
Explain this word to another players! You have only 60 sec. Good luck!
